results.title: The clinical application of metformin in children and adolescents: A short update
results.text_hl: In adolescents with @<m>DISEASE_Spondylodysplasia_And_Premature_Pubarche</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C567552 @@@premature pubarche@@@, intervention with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, as an @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitizing agent, either as mono-therapy or in combination with the anti-androgen @CHEMICAL_Flutamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005485 @@@flutamide@@@ at low doses, appeared to have some beneficial effects on @DISEASE_Abdominal_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D000007 @@@abdominal adiposity@@@, androgen levels and indices of @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@.
